text: Rafu is a Japanese word. It may refer to: * Rafoo Chakkar, a 1977 Hindi film * "Rafu", a 2017 Hindi song by Santanu Ghatak for the film Tumhari Sulu * Rafu Shimpo, a Japanese-English bilingual newspaper * Rafu Telephone Guide, a Japanese-English bilingual telephone directory
title: Rafu (disambiguation)
